proposal.name: WEBCL_OPTIONALLY_VISIBLE_INFO

contributors.contributor: Members of the WebCL working group

proposal.overview:
Allows the exposure of additional properties that are hidden in WebCL Core Specification.
Allows applications to query additional properties. Given that they are optionally visible, there is no guarantee that the info is available if the extension is implemented. All the extension guarantees is at least one additional property is available.
